products.name: Carnitas Mexican Taco
products.description: 4-inch nixtamalized corn flour tortilla, pot-braised pork, yellow onion, cilantro and lime. About 2.65oz, 165kcal. This product cannot be modified and is served at room temperature.

products.name: Pork Burrito
products.description: 12" wheat tortilla, cheese, beans, tomato rice, pulled pork, pico de gallo, lettuce, sour cream, and spicy sauce (we recommend Chipotle Sauce) - approx. 18 oz. This dish is served at room temperature

products.name: Chorizo Mexican Taco
products.description: 4-inch tortilla made from nixtamalized corn flour, homemade chorizo, yellow onion, cilantro, and lime. About 2.65oz, 165kcal. This product cannot be modified and is served at room temperature.

products.name: Mexican Taco Combo
products.description: Three 4-inch nixtamalized corn flour tortillas with oven-braised beef, pot-braised pork, and homemade chorizo, yellow onion, cilantro, and lime. About 8oz, 490kcal. This product cannot be modified and is served at room temperature.
